data.title: Mike Dunleavy Jr. news and rumors
data.text:
NBA market

Hawks waive Mike Dunleavy

The Atlanta Hawks has requested waivers on Mike Dunleavy, it was announced today by General Manager and Head of Basketball Operations Travis Schlenk.

NBA market

Cavaliers acquire Kyle Korver from Hawks

The Cleveland Cavaliers have acquired Kyle Korver from the Atlanta Hawks in exchange for Mike Dunleavy, Mo Williams, and a protected first round draft pick.

NBA market

Bulls send Dunleavy to Cavs to make room for Wade

The Cleveland Cavaliers will trade for Bulls small forward Mike Dunleavy. Chicago is parting ways with Dunleavy to shed cap space to make room for Dwyane Wade.

Injuries

Bulls remain optimistic Mike Dunleavy Jr. will return this season

Bulls coach Fred Hoiberg says he still thinks Mike Dunleavy Jr. will play this season. Dunleavy is working with a specialist as he recovers from a back injury.

Injuries

Mike Dunleavy expected out 4-6 more weeks

After meeting with specialists in Los Angeles, the Chicago Bulls' Mike Dunleavy is expected to need four-to-six weeks of additional rehabilitation on his back.

Injuries

Bulls' Dunleavy out 8-10 weeks after back procedure

Bulls forward Mike Dunleavy underwent a low back microdiscectomy procedure Friday at Rush University Medical Center. He is expected to be out 8-10 weeks.

NBA market

Mike Dunleavy agrees to deal to return to Bulls

Free-agent forward Mike Dunleavy has agreed to a three-year, $14.4 million contract to return to the Chicago Bulls, according to league sources.

Injuries

Bulls could sit Mike Dunleavy until after All-Star break

Mike Dunleavy will miss his 17th straight game Wednesday in Houston when the Bulls' six-game trip continues against the Rockets.

NBA games

Mike Dunleavy huge with 35 points in Bulls' playoff win

Mike Dunleavy scored 35 points, one short of his career-high, and Jimmy Butler hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 24 seconds remaining for a 100-97 Game 3 win.
